title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Download the Tomcat 7 binary from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance.

Expected result: The browser should display an HTTP error 404.

Actual result: The browser displays a 200 OK response with no content.
